transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan kaun?
Customer: Sorry main baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Sir actually aapko maine bola tha na concern open hua tha yaha pe aapne customer care pe call kiya tha.
Executive: Kya bol rahe?
Executive: Aaj subah se jo baat ho rahi hai na sir?
Customer: Haan bol raha hu main.
Executive: Aapne subah customer care se call kiya tha na kuch 9696 pe.
Customer: Haan haan kiya tha magar theek hai. Ho gaya mera kaam woh. Haan aata hai chota mota dikkat abhi kya karenge usko. Aapke haath mein toh koi hai hi nahi dikkat toh.
Executive: Bataiye sir kya dikkat hai?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Bataiye sir kaha pe dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Ek minute haan. Main gaadi zara side mein leta hu aapka aawaz khar khar aa raha hai.
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yeh abhi abhi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan aa rahi hai boliye na aap. Dikkat bol raha hu aapke haath mein bhi koi hai hi nahi na woh cheez. Jo dikkat solve kare.
Executive: Aap mujhe boliye toh sahi kaha pe issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Abhi issue aisa aa raha hai jab hum koi lead bhejte ho.
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: Jab koi lead bhejte ho toh ek lead paanch ya chhe jano ko jaata hai barabar hai?
Executive: Aapke alawa paanch jano ko.
Customer: Haan paanch log barabar hai. Haanji. Magar quantity ke hisab se mujhe kya bolna hai jab quantity rahegi zyada.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Toh 1000 square feet, 2000 square feet, 5000 square feet, aisi rahegi 1000 square feet ke aage.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Kaam rahega koi toh aap wholesale wale ko dete jaaiye na.
Executive: Achha aapko matlab retail ka issue aa raha hai ki retail ki lead zyada aa rahi hai aapko right?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Main bol rahi hu aapko retail ki lead zyada aa rahi hai yeh wala issue aa raha hai na?
Customer: Aawaz kam phir phir aa raha hai. Haan boliye.
Executive: Main bol rahi hu sir aapko retail ki lead zyada aa rahi hai na yeh issue aa raha hai na?
Customer: Nahi nahi mera show mera problem woh nahi hai. Mera problem actually aisa hai jab 100 square feet, 50 square feet, 200, 300, 400 ya 500 square feet jab kaam rahega koi blind ho, wallpaper ho ya dusra vertical blinds, venetian blinds, zebra blinds toh aap retail wale ko kyun nahi bhejte udhar woh side par?
Customer: Jab aapne jab kisi company ko hire kiya hai aapke isme toh aap unko poochte nahi kya khud banate ho ya manufacturer ya dusre se leke kaam karte ho. Yeh cheez mein kya hota hai malum hai na aap jab paanch logo ko lead bhejte ho paanch mein se do toh teen banane wale rehte hai udhar.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Abhi woh jo banane wala jab ₹80 mein woh blind dega toh main main jo retailer wala kya bechega udhar toh aapne woh main retailer hu main wholesale leke bechunga na mera dukaan hai khud ka.
Executive: Bilkul sir samajh gayi aapki dikkat jo hai. Haan jab ₹80 mein roller blind woh de raha hai wholesale wala toh woh customer ke paas 100 square feet bhi kaam rahega toh mere ko kaam kaise milega phir?
Executive: Aisa nahi hai sir dekhiye alag alag type ki cheez hai aapko aap agar uss cheez ka issue aa raha hai aap thoda paas ka customer dekh sakte hai ya phir humne alag alag type ke jo filter de rakhe hai sir woh cheeze de rakhe hai. Location ka filter de rakha hai, quantity ka filter de rakha hai, quantity ka nahi sorry uska order value ka filter de rakha hai aapko. Aap above 10,000 above 50,000 jo aapko deal value ka lagta hai square feet 1000 square feet ka agar aapko chahiye toh 1000 square feet ka kitne amount ka ho jaata hai uske hisab se aap 50,000 se upar ki deal value bhi check kariye.
Customer: Nahi nahi phir woh problem kya hota hai malum hai kya aap wholesale wale ko bhej sakte hai 1000 square feet ke aage rahega koi toh company ka kisko dena hai toh magar aap kya karte hai 100 200 square feet rahega na woh bhi wholesale wale ko supply karte ho order. Toh udhar 100 200 square feet ke liye wholesale wale ka kya kaam hai retail wale ko bhejta mat na udhar aap side par. Retail walo ko lead dena chahiye.
Executive: Dekhiye uske piche reason hai sir kaafi baar kya hota hai maan lijiye kisi ko customize wallpaper hi chahiye theek hai. Unhe maan lijiye requirement 2000 square feet ka hai theek hai but customer aapko jaanta nahi hai pehli baar aapse dealing kar raha hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh ab woh aapko trust nahi karta.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh ab aapko pehli baar mein toh sir woh aisa nahi hai na 2000 ka 2000 square feet le lenge pehle woh aapse kuch sample ki tarike se kuch kam quantity ka leke check karenge pehle. Theek hai agar unhe jam jaata hai aapse baat cheet jam jaati hai toh woh ho sakta hai aage chal ke next time jo order de aapko woh bada quantity ka order de de. Yeh har case mein nahi hai but aisa bhi hota hai.
Customer: Nahi abhi samajh mein kaise 100 square feet kaam hai abhi 100 square feet mein jab wholesale wala kam rate pe kaam karega wholesale wale ne toh ₹30-₹35 mein material laaya rehta hai woh toh ₹50-₹60 mein diya tabhi woh woh khush rahega. Magar jo customer ko bhi wohi rate dega aur mere ko bhi wohi rate dega material toh main kya bechu phir mere ko lead leke kya fayda ho udhar ka.
Executive: Nahi is cheez mein kya thoda sa aapko better guide na aap ek baar online aayenge toh kar paungi aap kis time tak office pahunch payenge aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello haan boliye.
Executive: Haan main bol rahi hu kis time tak aap office pahunchenge ek baar bataiyega.
Customer: Aapka ek jo hai na mera zara aawaz toh kuch khar khar aawaz aa raha hai aapki isliye mere samajh mein nahi aa raha. Sir aapka call main drop kar deti hu. Okay matlab main call back kar leti hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are being sent to wholesalers for retail.

- Wants only retail leads for small projects.



Resolution:

- Executive explained filter options for order value.

- Suggested checking deal value above ₹50,000.

- Explained why leads are sent to multiple vendors.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, retail, wholesale, filters
